name: Wake Up! (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
You woke up in a dark maze.

You can't seem to remember what happened.

A shadowy figure appears and offers you guidance.

Description :

Wake Up is a short 2D game where you have to gather all of the fragments of your memories in the form of shards to be able to escape from a nightmare.

Controls :

W, A, S, D - Walk

Hold Left Shift - Run

Interact - E

Collect Shard - F
